title: Emerald and Polki Diamond Kada - "Paccha Manikyam Kadiyam"
features: This exquisite Kada features alternating Emerald and Polki diamond settings in a traditional South Indian design. The Emeralds are meticulously chosen for their vibrant green color and are smoothly cabochon cut. The Polki diamonds, each unique in their natural form, are carefully set in a closed setting, enhancing their brilliance. Delicate filigree work accents the spaces between the gemstones. The 'Hyderabadi Polish' gives the gold a rich, lustrous finish.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Can also be worn as a statement piece for modern events and festive gatherings.
description: This Kada is a timeless investment piece, blending traditional South Indian craftsmanship with the natural beauty of Emeralds and Polki diamonds. The use of high-purity gold and natural gemstones ensures lasting value and enduring elegance. The unique design and vibrant colors make it a perfect heirloom piece to be passed down through generations. The 'Paccha Manikyam Kadiyam' symbolizes prosperity, good fortune, and enduring love.
